BM.definition: Brandy Melville, fashion brand known for clothes targeted at very slim young women; (generic usage) fashions for petite young women

B站.definition: (coll.) Bilibili, Chinese video-sharing website featuring scrolled user comments 彈幕|弹幕[dan4 mu4] overlaid on the videos

B超.definition: B-mode ultrasonography; prenatal ultrasound scan; abbr. for B型超聲|B型超声[B xing2 chao1 sheng1]
